name: Airplux Tenologies Limited
tag_list: antenna, wifi, wimax, repeater, wireless, telecommunication, networking
overview:
Airplux Technologies Limited is a leading manufacturer and distributor of high quality communications products. Airplux manufactures superior quality antennas, repeaters, combiners and splitters. Airplux distributes a full line of wired and wireless connectivity products, offers you the one stop communications solutions, and provides you with exactly what you need to complete your communications project.

Our Products

Airplux offers superior quality antennas, active device,passive components,accessories,includes a full line of wired and wireless connectivity products.

Our Service

Airplux provides OEM/ODM service, we can manufacturer,design and source products according to clientsâ€™ different requirements.

Our Experience

With 10 years experienced of technology background, we specialise in developing customised designs to satisfy the requirements of our customers. We boast complete capability, expertise and experience to design and develop products for most communication systems.

Our Quality

All Airplux manufacturing, test and development procedures are compatible with ISO 9001 and environmental standards of ISO 14001. All our products are fully tested against the specifications to ensure quality to the customer.
